resources:
Lignite Lignite Sending feedback... Please enter some text. Unknown error Feedback sent! Thanks a lot :) This is a required field. Someone is already using this account, silly goose. If this is your account, please reset it using the 1st link below, and then try logging in again. Logging in... Account doesn't exist, sorry Other unknown error. Feel free to try again. Server error, but feel free to try again. Pledged Animation Mode Sorry! Your watch doesn't seem to be connected... Please connect your watch through the Pebble/Pebble Time app, and retry sending the setting.

Weekday Advanced date Digital time Minute analogue circle Hour analogue circle

Amount of bars = minutes Equalizer Animation Mode Show day Wave Music Expand and Slam Battery bar
Colour Picker Corrected Uncorrected Selected Colour:
Battery bar mode Date Date format Mode Secondly No battery indicators Bar only Text only Bar and text Mo. day, year mm dd yy Week: ww dd mm yy Week: ww Weekday Grow Flower Month dd, YYYY Day - mm/dd/yy Day - dd/mm/yy mm/dd/yy
Speedometer is a watchface that's sure to pop off your screen!

It features bars that fill up as time or other data progresses, such as the weekday, minute, and battery percentage. Kids of the 80s know exactly what this is. Have a "voice box" right on your wrist with a talking animation when the time changes.

On the lefthand side you see the date and on the opposite the remaining battery. A nice square design where you can choose colors and see the time in nice big numbers.

There are quite a few options as well, and goes well with any outfit you may wear! A very simple yet very stylish face displaying nothing but the time and date.

There are quite a few settings here as well, and of course: customizable colours. This face is soon to have larger fonts! This watchface is really gonna make your Pebble Time's display shine by changing the colours every minute, filling the black background with beautiful shades of colour.

Find in settings the ability to change the width of these bars and other aspects of the face. Quite beautiful! Official watchface for TimeDock by Engineerable! Available on the appstore. 

Settings include being able to open the face when plugged in, animations, and more. Check it out, it's free. This one will truly live on the colour screen! Every minute a 'branch' grows randomly emulating a growing branch of a tree (hence the name).

Every hour it resets itself and since the growing and coloring happens randomly it always looks different. Our take on a watch face with two timezones giving you many personalizing options too!

The inner circle shows the time for the first timezone (in the above example for Philipp’s timezone) and the outer one stands for the second timezone (Edwin, in the above example). A unique designed based around an actual slot machine. Watch the numbers shrink in and out of view as time passes by!

Slot Machine comes with a few other handy features, such as battery bar and shake to animate, just in case. This is another face living through its animations. We could either let the circle grow every minute or have a pulse animation every minute changing the background color.

This will really make the Pebble Time’s colour display shine! Simplicity meets class with Simplified Analogue. 

We listened to user requests and created this face: it features the digital time but with a minimal and awesome looking analogue display. Customize about every colour and turn on/off anything you don't like. Personal is what it says it is: Personal.

Customize Personal to show your name and see it greet you across the day. Beautifully optimized for Pebble Time's display, it truly looks amazing. Beat is an attractive watchface with more than enough animations which uses it's unique "beatline" to show information such as the battery level or bluetooth status (or if you want, have it completely random).

There are some damn cool animations that catch the eye and make it look as if your wrist is actually monitoring your heartbeat! Not to mention, you can find settings for customizing colours and other features in the Lignite companion app. Another one making your color display go wild! 

The bars have many different animation modes such as roll, wave, music, and more! You can choose how often you want these to animate and more. The battery bar acts as a divider. Sports the time, weekday, and date as well.
Email Password Please enter your Lignite account details Check Login Can't login? Reset your acccount here. No account? Click to continue without one.
(Go back) Forgot your password? Click here to find it again. Welcome back
Restore Install Purchase bundles Purchase Settings Credits Cancel Kickstarter Backer Login Are you a Kickstarter backer? Restoring purchases... Restored Purchases All of your previous purchases have been restored. Thanks a lot for your support! Logout Send feedback Send Logging you out... Pick an app
Tutorial Would you like to take a quick tutorial of the app? Swipe left and right to go between apps and watchfaces Nice job! Now try tapping on the Pebble... Pretty cool, eh? You can use this button to install the currently shown watchface or app Like something we've made? To unlock that watchface and its settings forever, purchase it using this button! Sweet. Here's where you can restore any purchases you may have made in the past Tap here to access: Kickstarter backer login (you know who you are...), and other various actions. That's it for now! We hope you enjoy Lignite. The preview builder allows you to see some more screenshots of the watchface or app you're on. It also lets you set your default Pebble which will be displayed across the rest of the app. Swipe left or right on the preview Pebble to switch between all 9 models, from Pebble Time Steel to original Pebble. Favourite Pebble model? Click here to set it as default. Swipe left or right on the screenshot to scroll through all provided screenshots. Replay tutorial Awesome! Nice Alright, thanks! Okay Thanks! Alright Cool, bye bye! Cool, show me! Skip tutorial
Build a Preview Screenshot Set as default Pebble Pebble Steel - Black Pebble Steel - Silver Time Steel - Black Time Steel - Silver Time Steel - Gold Pebble Time - Black Pebble Time - Red Pebble Time - White Pebble - Black Pebble - Red Pebble - White
Description Type Crash Bug Design-related Feature-related Other Importance Feedback goes directly to Edwin's server. Your user ID (access code) will be tied to it. See our privacy policy at: http://lignite.io/policy. We use your feedback to improve the Lignite Collection as we strive to optimize and make some of the best watchfaces and watchapps out there. Your feedback hit the server successfully. Thanks! Feel free to post more feedback, or go back to the main screen.
Nice try. Someone is already logged in to this account. If you are the owner of this account, you can reset your account for access by clicking the link below and following the instructions on our external website. Now, now... No Lignite accounts were found with this username and password, sorry! Make sure it's perfectly typed. Please avoid copy-pasting. (Error 404) Oops, silly goose! Not sure how to handle this one: Well, that's embarassing. My friend Failed Failed to even reach the server. Error: Failed to log you out, sorry! Error: Illegal Account You're illegally logged in. Potentially because your account was reset with the account resetter. You've now been forced to logout! Enjoy. Damn, okay Tampered With Who do you think you are, 1337 leet haxor? You clearly tampered with NSUserDefaults to try and get free apps. Why not just pay a dollar and help me out? Sure, I'm a no good freeloader but I'll pay the price! Can't make payments :( Unfortunately, it looks like you are unable to make purchases.

This is most likely due to parental controls or you're on a device controlled by a school/office/workplace. Sorry! Your feedback failed to even send, sorry! Error: Your feedback failed to hit the server. Response:. Feel free to try again. Please select a different app to replay the tutorial. Error Unlocking Trial Error Sending Setting Retry Sending Ignore Sorry about this, but it seems that the message has timed out. This usually means that your Pebble isn't connected. Please check that Bluetooth is on and your Pebble is connected! Sorry! The watchapp rudely rejected the message. This usually means that the wrong app is open. Please open the correct app on your Pebble and retry. Sorry! The watchapp/watchface was probably tired (or you have the wrong watchface/watchapp open) and failed to acknowledge the message sent to it. Feel free to retry. Well, that's embarassing. Unknown error:. Email contact@edwinfinch.com if this issue persists.
Alert for: When setting fails to send: Pebble app to open for install Trial unlock failing Setting not sending Play sound/vibrate Manage Alerts Lignite Settings Manage Settings Original Pebble Pebble Time Ask me every time Which app? What Pebble app would you like to open?

If you have a black & white Pebble, click 'Original Pebble'. If you have a colour display, click 'Pebble Time'.

You can turn off this question in settings (click 'Manage Settings').
Okay Okay, thanks! Please wait... Hello there! No Yes Thank you to every single person, from family to backers, that helped make this project a reality. When Philipp and I originally launched our Lignite Kickstarter in March of 2015, we never expected 1176 backers or $7,177 CAD. You all blew us away with your love and support for our work, and we hope we can pay you back with an awesome collection of watchfaces and apps. This is truly a dream come true.Below lies the list of people who brought this project to life.

Companion app developer, Pebble app/watchface developer, and server-backend developer: Edwin Finch (edwinfinch.com)

Designer of companion app, designer of every single Pebble app/watchface, website and graphic creator: Philipp Weder (iphibse.ch)

Special thanks to (by Edwin):
-My mom, Tara Bauer, for being insanely supportive of my work and always motivating me :)
-My dad, AJ Finch, who always shows me a reasonable and calm perspective on everything, and gives me a better outlook on life.
-My brother, Tucker Finch, for being my best friend and person I can say anything and everything to, the person I trust my life with.
-The rest of my family and my friends for being awesome and loving.
-Arrested Development, Community, and Chuck for being awesome TV shows where I can blow off some steam and have a laugh.

Big thanks to the Lignite Translation Team!
Martijn - Dutch
Berkay Oğulcan TUTAL - Turkish
Sam Zhang - Simplified Chinese
Marco Vasta - Italian
Monika Mangs - Finnish and Swedish
Peter Davidson - Spanish
Philipp Weder - German
Paulo Martins - Portuguese
